problem_text_cn: 如图,路灯AB的高度为8米,树CD与路灯的水平距离为4米,则得树在灯光下的影长DE为3米,则树高()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the height of the street lamp AB is N_0, and the horizontal distance between the tree CD and the street lamp is N_1, then the shadow length of the tree under the light DE is N_2, then the height of the tree is ()
raw_answer:
解:因为CD∥AB,∴△AEB∽△CED,∴AB:CD=BE:ED,
即8:CD=7:3
解得:AB=\frac{24}{7}m．
故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题只要是把实际问题抽象到相似三角形中,利用相似三角形的相似比,列出方程,通过解方程求出路灯的高度,体现了转化的思想．
